entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Rain near the border early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
